description: This file is a Flutter application source code implementing a Tic-Tac-Toe game, including UI widgets, game logic, AI moves, and theme configuration.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring app theme and home page.

classes.name: GamePage
classes.description: Main game widget managing game state, UI, and interactions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application, runs the TicTacToeApp.

methods.name: _buildLightScheme
methods.description: Configures the light color scheme used throughout the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of the widgets, constructing the UI layout.

methods.name: isCellEmpty
methods.description: Checks whether a specific cell on the board is empty.

methods.name: restartGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: setMode
methods.description: Switches between Player vs Player and Player vs AI modes.

methods.name: handleTap
methods.description: Handles user's tap action on a game cell.

methods.name: _evaluateBoardAndMaybeContinue
methods.description: Evaluates the current board for a winner or draw, and proceeds accordingly.

methods.name: _handleWin
methods.description: Handles game end when there's a winner, updates scores.

methods.name: _handleDraw
methods.description: Handles game end in a draw, updates counters.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board for a winner based on winning combinations.

methods.name: _aiMove
methods.description: Executes AI move using a simple strategy after user's turn.

methods.name: _findBestMove
methods.description: Finds a move that can secure a win or block opponent.
